name: places/ChIJyabhiVZYwokRNcV8vs9YIqY
formattedAddress: 600 Washington St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 600 Washington St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text:
My experience with these guys has been top notch. First, they are really on the ball in terms of the administrative aspect of what they do. I've made all my appointments online or through my phone, completed all my initial paperwork on online, and have been able to stay in touch with all the therapists either by email or text. In fact I don't think I've had to call this place once. They also have gone to great lengths to handle everything with my insurance, including submitting claims, documentation, etc to my insurance provider even though I am out-of-network.

I work mostly with Fernando, who has been helping me recover from a recent surgery to repair a ruptured distal bicep tendon. He's been a great therapist who's also given me great advice about how to modify and resume my gym routine post-surgery. I always leave my appointments with him feeling incrementally better than I did before and my recovery has been progressing outstandingly overall.

I've also worked with Karl and Steve a bit. Everyone here has been really accessible and happy to offer advice or help. I have some issues with knee pain that sometimes worsens when I do a lot of heavy squats at the gym. After mentioning it to these guys, Karl worked with me to diagnose the source of this pain, and Fernando and Steve immediately began incorporating additional work into my sessions to resolve it. Since then I've been knee-pain free while continuing to do my heavy squats.

originalText.text:
I've been working with both Steve and, more recently, Fernando to help me with a problematic broken ankle.  Both guys have been great.  Steve's other reviews here speak for themselves so I will rather focus on my treatment with Fernando.

In short, I'm very impressed.  It was clear that there had been a solid handover between Steve and Fernando.  He quickly understood my issue and the work we'd already undertaken, and then presented a clear direction of how we were going to move forward.  Fernando is personable and swiftly made me feel comfortable...but not so comfortable that the therapy was easy!  He certainly made me work for it and knew just how far to push me.  I appreciated his approach and definitely felt like I was in the hands of a professional.

My treatment with both Steve and Fernando has been flexible to my routine, accommodating to change, personal, responsive, professional, tough going and, above all, enjoyable.  Highly recommended.

originalText.text:
Steve has resolved my chronic back pain problem, which is worth repeating.  Steve has resolved my chronic back pain problem!  I am an active person and the thought of having my time at the gym reduced or having my recreational activities hindered due to back pain was not an option.

I have seen several other physical therapists in the past with no signs of improvement and had given-up on PT.  That was until I met Steve at my gym, where Steve was providing evaluations.  I was so impressed with Steve’s knowledge, which included a quick understanding an appreciation of my exact back problem, I reached out to him via email that afternoon and made an appointment.  More importantly, Steve took the time to listen to me an answer all of my questions.

Steve is also incredibly generous with his knowledge and has worked very closely with my personal trainer to develop an exercise routine tailored just for me. This is what ultimately cured me.

I would be remiss if I didn’t mention that Steve also happens to be a great guy. He’s fun to hangout with and I feel like I’ve known him for years.  Perhaps that’s the reason why I recently injured my knee. It must have been a Freudian thing in order to postpone my graduation from iPT.  My new malady is improving under Steve’s guidance – aka: “Steve Horney’s Helping Hands”.

In addition, Steve believes strongly in the value of increasing his knowledge.  He remains up-to-date with current trends and prevailing breakthroughs by continuing his education regularly not only within his practice field, but beyond.

Finally, Steve and Matt have exceeded my expectations by working directly with my insurance company, a time consuming task to say the least. They have resolved an issue concerning my reimbursements and I can’t thank them enough.

originalText.text:
I am your typical over scheduled New Yorker. I have participated in two Marathons, run half’s and 10Ks for fun, but mostly running is my therapy that I do every morning. I injured my hamstring a few years ago and have since always been nervous it would slow my training or disrupt my routine, which happened earlier this past winter.

My previous trainer, who was a former professional Hockey Player, I thought was the best until I met and worked with Steve. Steve is through, thoughtful and has hands of an angel! I have gone through the typical circuit of apply the stimulator to the affected area, heat, stretches, ultrasound and then massage for weeks with my previous therapist- slowing my recovery and resting for several weeks.

With Steve, his hands on manipulation, education and treatment plan made me stronger then I was before and healed me quicker!  He is dedicated, very professional and honest about the severity of your injury and recovery.

Steve is so knowledgeable, personable and motivated to get you back up and stronger than before. I would follow him anywhere. Dont make the mistake of slowing your recovery- go to Steve.

originalText.text: For the past couple of years, I've been working with Steve and Fernando of iPT, beginning several months before I had back surgery, in an effort to have a quick recovery. Thanks to them, I did, gaining strength and flexibility in my hamstrings and my core. Since then, we've done more work, mainly on my neck and upper back, and they've helped me to correct other issues such as my posture and sleep position. Over time, I've watch iPT grow, and Steve, Fernando, and Karl are all incredibly knowledgable and helpful, and I highly reccomend them to anyone looking to feel better.

Over time, I've watch iPT grow, and Steve, Fernando, and Karl are all incredibly knowledgable and helpful, and I highly reccomend them to anyone looking to feel better.
